XData.name: Cube
XData.Data: <cube xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/deepsee" name="ArticleGenInfo" displayName="ArticleGenInfo" disabled="false" abstract="false" sourceClass="habrAnalytics.ArticleGeneralInfo" countMeasureName="%COUNT" bucketSize="8" bitmapChunkInMemory="false" precompute="0"> <dimension name="author" displayName="Автор" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All author" allDisplayName="author" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="author" name="author" displayName="автор" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="habrId" displayName="Статьи" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All habrId" allDisplayName="habrId" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="habrId" name="habrId" displayName="статьи" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> <property sourceExpression="$e(%source.name,1,25)" name="name" displayName="статьи" disabled="false" hidden="false" isName="true" isDescription="false" isReference="false" useDisplayValue="true"></property> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="hubs" displayName="Хабы" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All hubs" allDisplayName="hubs" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="hubs" name="hubs" displayName="хабы" disabled="false" list="true" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="dateOfCreation" displayName="Дата создания" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All dateOfCreation" allDisplayName="dateOfCreation" sourceProperty="dateOfCreation" type="time" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level name="dateOfCreation" displayName="год создания" disabled="false" timeFunction="Year" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="dateOfCreation1" displayName="месяц создания" disabled="false" timeFunction="MonthNumber" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="dateOfCreation2" displayName="день создания" disabled="false" timeFunction="DayNumber" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="dateOfPublication" displayName="Дата публикации" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All dateOfPublication" allDisplayName="dateOfPublication" sourceProperty="dateOfPublication" type="time" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level name="dateOfPublication" displayName="Год публикации" disabled="false" timeFunction="Year" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="dateOfPublication1" displayName="Месяц публикации" disabled="false" timeFunction="MonthNumber" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="dateOfPublication2" displayName="День публикации" disabled="false" timeFunction="DayNumber" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="dateOfPublication1" displayName="Дата публикации " disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All dateOfPublication1" allDisplayName="dateOfPublication1" sourceProperty="dateOfPublication" type="time" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level name="dateOfPublication" displayName="мм-гггг" disabled="false" timeFunction="MonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <measure sourceProperty="votes" name="votes" displayName="голоса" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="integer" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="views" name="views" displayName="просмотры" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="integer" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="rating" name="rating" displayName="рейтинг" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="integer" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="favorites" name="favorites" displayName="избранное" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="integer" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="comments" name="comments" displayName="комментарии " disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="integer" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="habrId" name="habrId" displayName="количество статей" disabled="false" aggregate="COUNT" type="integer" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <calculatedMember name="среднее число просмотров на статью" disabled="false" dimension="Measures" valueExpression="[Measures].views / [Measures].habrId" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <calculatedMember name="среднее число комментариев на статью" disabled="false" dimension="Measures" valueExpression="[Measures].comments / [Measures].habrId" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <calculatedMember name="средний рейтинг на статью" disabled="false" dimension="Measures" valueExpression="[Measures].rating / [Measures].habrId" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <calculatedMember name="среднее число голосов на статью" disabled="false" dimension="Measures" valueExpression="[Measures].votes / [Measures].habrId" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <calculatedMember name="среднее число добавлений в избранное на статью" disabled="false" dimension="Measures" valueExpression="[Measures].favorites / [Measures].habrId" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <listing name="список" disabled="false" listingType="table" fieldList="name,author,url"></listing> </cube>
